entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
